Elevate Your Learning with Anki Highlight Helper!  (Setup instructions below)

Effortlessly create and manage your Anki flashcards straight from your browser. Anki Highlight Helper is designed for students, educators, and lifelong learners who want to maximize their study efficiency. This intuitive Chrome extension integrates smoothly with Anki, enabling you to generate flashcards quickly and easily from any webpage.

With Anki Highlight Helper, your study sessions become more productive, allowing you to capture key information in just a few clicks. Whether you're browsing articles, research papers, or online textbooks, this tool ensures that you never miss an important detail.

----------Features----------
✅Simple Card Creation: Select text on a webpage, right-click, and choose "Make Anki Card" to quickly add new flashcards to Anki.

✅Deck & Note Type Selection: Choose your preferred deck and note type for each card.

----------Setup----------
⚠️NECESSARY STEPS⚠️
1) Open the Anki desktop application.
2) Navigate to Tools > Add-ons > Get Add-ons.
3) Enter the code 2055492159 to download and install the AnkiConnect add-on.
4) Go to Tools > Add-ons and find AnkiConnect in the list.
5) Select AnkiConnect and click Config.
6) Update the address field from "http://localhost" to "*".
7) Save your changes and restart Anki to apply the configuration.
